item.title: 50-year-old Raichur resident dies in freak mishap
item.description:
<![CDATA[A 50-year-old man from Raichur district died after he and two others were hit by a pick up vehicle near Shankara Bhavan hotel in Kulai, on National Highway 66 on Saturday.
The Mangaluru Traffic North police gave name of deceased as Deepugouda alias Pompanagouda, 50, a resident of Sindhanur in Raichur District. He is relative of Sindhanur MLA Hampanagouda Badarli.
The names of injured persons are Pradeep Kolkar, 35, a resident of Karatgi in Koppal, and Nagaraj Umesh Amin, 42, a resident of Kodi...]]>
item.author: Authors
